workflow.title: Affimetrix microarray: part one (obs)
workflow.description: The R/MAANOVA package [1] is being adapted to carry out our computations. To enable R/MAANOVA to handle probe-sets with different probe numbers, which is necessary when using probe-set definitions other than the original one provided by Affimetrix, we will pre-process the input data by dividing it into groups, each group formed by genes reported by the same number of probes.
